It's a romantic comedy about a couple whose happiness is intertwined with solving mysteries, with the happy duo tackling existential questions that will resonate with anyone who has ever wondered what it truly means to be alive.

If you're interested in a suspenseful and psychological thriller, 'Paradise Lost' (1667) is a must-see. The film features a group of contestants stranded on a deserted island where one turns into a vengeful killer.

For a more lighthearted and thought-provoking movie, 'Before I Go to Sleep' (2011) is an excellent choice. The film explores the power of memory and the challenges of personal growth, leaving you with a lot to ponder after the credits roll.
